name: Blade and Sorcery
description: Blade & Sorcery is a built-for-VR medieval fantasy sandbox with full physics driven melee, ranged and magic combat. Become a powerful warrior, ranger or sorcerer and devastate your enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / 1060
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
